description:
Removal/variation of condition 3 of Planning Permission P120600 dated 27 July 2012. The variation from the approved drawings involve the following: 
- Omission of zinc up stand to the perimeter boundary walls and replaced with brickwork same height
- Pitched roof section finished clad in standing seam zinc
- Alteration to internal layout with new hallway created and variation to en suite bedroom
- Front entrance  relocated from west elevation and now proposed on north elevation replacing window. 
- Additional roof lights added to provide additional light.
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

519_001, Existing Plans - 519_100, 519_101, 519_102, 519_101, 519_111, 519_112, 519_113, 519_121, 519_122, 519_123; Demolition Plans - 519_151; 519_161; 519_162; 519_163; 519_171; 519_172; Proposed Plans - 519_270, 519_271; 519_272; 519_281; 519_282; 519_283; 519_291; 519_292; 519_293; Daylight and Sunlight Study dated 3rd October 2011 carried out by Right of Light Consulting Chartered Surveyors, Design and Access Statement dated March 2012.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
